metadata.description: A raycaster engine developed in c++.

content.paragraph: I developed a raycaster engine that began as a project in C and later transitioned to C++. The engine supports OpenGL for rendering and includes features like multiple Z heights, which adds verticality to the 2D raycasting technique. It also integrates with Tiled, allowing for easier level design and editing. This project was my first time working with C and C++, making it a valuable learning experience, especially in understanding lower-level programming concepts and graphics rendering.

content.legend: The engine allow for multiple z-height
